cheatsheet.title: Erste Schritte für TOP20 Self Assessments

intro.description:
Willkommen bei TOP20 Self Assessments in verinice.
Dieses Tutorial wird Ihnen dabei helfen, Ihr erstes TOP20 Self Assessment mit verinice durchzuführen.

item.title: Neues Self Assessment beginnen
item.description:
Öffnen Sie den Self Assessment View:
Menu -> View -> Open Perspective... -> Other
Select Self Assessment Perspective, Click OK
You find the Self Assessment View on left side of the Window.
Click the new button in the toolbar of the view.
item.onCompletion: Excellent! If you want to continue, read one of the next chapters.

item.title: Browse the self assessment
item.description: To browse the self assessment use the topic tree in the Self Assessment View. A single click on one of topic opens the topic in the Control Browser. You can now read all details of the topic.
item.onCompletion: Excellent! If you want to continue, read the next chapter.

item.title: Edit the self assessment
item.description: To edit the self assessment use the topic tree in the Self Assessment View. A double click on one of topic opens the topic in the editor. You can now edit the state of the topic.
item.onCompletion: Excellent! If you want to continue, read the next chapter.
